vocabURI="http://lod.data-archive.ac.uk/skoshasset/c7ef1ece-a170-42e6-80fc-86889073f6e7">USA</keyword>         <topcClas>Economic conditions and indicators - Economics</topcClas>         <topcClas>Trade, industry and markets - Industry and management</topcClas>       </subject>       <abstract><p>Abstract copyright UK Data Service and data collection copyright owner.</p>The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) Productivity Statistics includes indicators on labour productivity, multi-factor productivity (MFP) and capital services. It also includes OECD estimates of labour productivity levels and a breakdown of gross domestic product (GDP) per capita in its components. Data run from 1985 and are internationally comparable.<br> <br> These data were first provided by the UK Data Service in March 2015. The UK Data Service web site includes further information on the OECD Productivity Statistics holdings, including a <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/use-data/guides/dataset/prod-statistics.aspx" title="OECD Productivity Statistics dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a> and details of <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/prod/2014" title="OECD Productivity Statistics dataset user guide">latest database updates</a>.<br> <br> Citation: The bibliographic citation for the database is: Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development ({YYYY}): OECD Productivity Statistics ({Edition: YYYY}). UK Data Service. DOI: {edition specific doi - e.g.<a href="dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/prod/2014" title="dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/prod/2014">http://dx.doi.org/10.5257/oecd/prod/2014</a>}.  <br> <br> Alternative DOIs: <a href="http://dx.doi.org/10.1787/pdtvy-data-en" title=/10.1787/pdtvy-data-en</a> (to access via OECD.Stat subscription).<br> <br> </abstract>       <sumDscr>         <timePrd event="start" date="1985-01-01T00:00:00Z">1985</timePrd>         <timePrd event="end" date="2014-01-01T00:00:00Z">2014</timePrd>         <nation>Multi-nation</nation>         <geogUnit>Countries</geogUnit>         <universe>Cross-national; National</universe>         <universe>The countries covered are Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Chile, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Korea, Luxembourg, Mexico, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovak Republic, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, United Kingdom, and United States. See <a href="http://www.oecd.org/about/membersandpartners/list-oecd-member-countries.htm" title="List of OECD members and partners">full list of OECD members and partners</a></universe>       </sumDscr>     </stdyInfo>     <method>       <dataColl>         <timeMeth>Time Series</timeMeth>         <timeMeth>annual</timeMeth>         <sampProc>See documentation for details.</sampProc>         <collMode>For details of methodology, please see the <a href="http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/use-data/guides/dataset/prod-statistics.aspx" title="OECD Productivity Statistics dataset user guide">dataset user guide</a>.</collMode>         <sources />         <weight>See documentation for details .</weight>       </dataColl>     </method>     <dataAccs>       <setAvail>         <accsPlac><a href=http://www.esds.ac.uk/international/access/dataset_overview.asp >ESDS International, Manchester Information and Associated Services </a></accsPlac>       </setAvail>       <useStmt>         <specPerm>Restricted access</specPerm>         <restrctn>Registration is required and standard conditions of use apply.
